Package io.crums.sldg

Class SkipPath

java.lang.Object
io.crums.sldg.Path
io.crums.sldg.SkipPath
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.crums.io.Serial, io.crums.util.hash.Digest
public class SkipPath
extends Path
A path in V-form (the shape the list of paths looks like if printing a line per row). This is the shortest-path layout.
See Also:
Path.isSkipPath()

  • Constructor Details

    • SkipPath

      public SkipPath​(java.util.List<Row> path)
      Creates a new instance with no beacons.

    • SkipPath

      public SkipPath​(java.util.List<Row> path, java.util.List<io.crums.util.Tuple<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Long>> beacons)
      Creates a new instance. The arguments are defensively copied.
      Parameters:
      path - the shortest possible list of rows in ascending row numbers, each row linked to from the next via one of that next row's hash pointers
      See Also:
      Path.MAX_ROWS

    • SkipPath

      public SkipPath​(Path skipPath)
      Constructor promotes a path to an instance of this class.
      Parameters:
      skipPath - skipPath.isSkipPath() returns true
